API Reference
============

This page documents the public API functions of the WizardSData library.

Configuration Functions
----------------------

.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.set_config
.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.get_config
.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.is_config_valid
.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.save_config
.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.load_config

Generation Functions
-------------------

.. autofunction:: wizardsdata.start_generation

Alternative Module View
----------------------

If you prefer to see the API organized by module, you can use the following:

.. automodule:: wizardsdata
   :members: set_config, get_config, is_config_valid, save_config, load_config, start_generation
   :undoc-members: false
   :show-inheritance: false
